name: Zottman Curl
cues: Stand tall with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward
Curl the weights up with palms up (supinated grip)
At the top, rotate your palms to face down (pronated grip) and lower the weights slowly
Rotate your palms back up at the bottom and repeat
Move slowly and with control, especially on the lowering phase
Keep elbows close to your body
Use a moderate weight to maintain good form
